column1: Weighted MRI visualization size (256, 128, 1) in T2 of the skull of a man of 37 years old, with axial section n°152 starting at the base of the skull. We distinguishe clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4134.3750 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3891.7969 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 97.5586 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 32.9590 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4205.5664 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3761.2793 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 113.3789 mm³ and the right caudate nucleus of volume 54.0527 mm³.
